javaMasterclass.title: Java Programming Masterclass
javaMasterclass.description: Master Java from basics to advanced concepts. Learn OOP, data structures, and build real applications.

cppCourse.title: C/C++ Complete Course
cppCourse.description: Learn C and C++ programming from scratch. Understand memory management, pointers, and system programming.

databaseDesign.title: Database Design & SQL
databaseDesign.description: Master relational databases, SQL queries, normalization, and database optimization techniques.

uxuiDesign.title: UX/UI Design Fundamentals
uxuiDesign.description: Learn user experience and interface design principles. Master Figma and design thinking methodologies.

reactDevelopment.title: Frontend Development with React
reactDevelopment.description: Build modern web applications with React, hooks, state management, and component architecture.

nodejsDevelopment.title: Backend Development with Node.js
nodejsDevelopment.description: Learn server-side development with Node.js, Express, RESTful APIs, and authentication.

pythonMachine.title: Python for Machine Learning
pythonMachine.description: Learn ML algorithms, data preprocessing, model training, and neural networks with Python libraries.

webSecurity.title: Web Security Essentials
webSecurity.description: Understand OWASP top 10, secure coding practices, encryption, authentication, and threat prevention.
